::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

:::


::: {.callout-tip title="Part 1. Thinking about life" collapse="true" icon="false" style="text-align: center;"}
This a part 1 of N of my series of time tracking. This part serves as a brief introduction to the project and it's rationale. Other parts will go in depth and answer specific questions.
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Part 2. Why track your daily life?" collapse="true" icon="false" style="text-align: center;"}
In this part we go over some of the reasons why you should and shouldn't track your daily activities. Who will benefit from using it...
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Part 3. How to track your daily life?" collapse="true" icon="false" style="text-align: center;"}
In this section you'll read about different approaches to tracking one's time based on the goals you have in mind. Not everyone should do it the same way!
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Part 4. Answering questions with data" collapse="true" icon="false" style="text-align: center;"}
Part 4 provides examples of what kind of data-driven answers you can get by tracking your time.
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Part 5. Predicting behavior with data" collapse="false" icon="false" style="text-align: center;"}
Part 5 as a continuation of part 4 explores way of predicting one's own time spending.
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Part 6. TBA" collapse="true" icon="false" style="text-align: center;"}
More dataviz
:::
